name: My Journey (Amadeus Herrera)
description:
"I remember being so afraid! I am looking left and right, but everything looks the same. Just trees everywhere. So tall I can barely see the sky. And it is just me, where are the other people? My heart is beating so fast I can hear the blood pumping in my ears. I scream for help and my voice..."

My Journey is a first-person exploration game set in a far away land full of reminders of the past. Suddenly misterious stones with runes carved appeared, find them all to escape back to reality... be careful though, you don't know what lies behind those gates!
